description: DUNGEON RUNNER is a platform game in which we will have to flee from monster through a dangerous dungeon . An endless corridor with a colorful visual style where the game will end when we collide and the monster catches us.
name: DUNGEON RUNNER
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
